REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2362 reute d f BC-EXOVIR-TO-BUYBACK-UP 10-20 0054

TEXT.TITLE: EXOVIR TO BUYBACK UP TO ONE MLN DLRS OF STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Exovir Inc <XOVR.O> said its board authorized the purchase of up to one mln dlrs of the comapny's common stock in open market transactions. The company said based on currrent market conditions, it believes the stock is substantially undervalued. Reuter
